hero_subtitle: Bravel is a platform that can connect your desire to train to other people
features_subtitle: Bravel is a platform that can connect your desire to train to other people
features_1_description: Do what you love, meet others who love it, find your community and evolve together. The rest is history!
features_2_description: Events are happening on just about any topic you can think of, from soccer and calisthenics to yoga and hiking.
features_3_description: You don’t have to be an expert to gather people together and explore shared interests.
group_categories_title: Some of the training groups categories
group_categories_subtitle: Some of the most popular training group categories
